.. _api-docs:


STIG Manager API Definition
#############################################################

STIG Manager implements the OpenAPI 3.0.1 Definition shown here. Check the repository for more details: `STIG Manager OSS OpenAPI definition <https://github.com/NUWCDIVNPT/stig-manager/blob/main/api/source/specification/stig-manager.yaml>`_ .   



.. openapi:: ../../api/source/specification/stig-manager.yaml
